reuters.title: HEALTHSOUTH <HSRC> FILES FOR SHARE OFFERING
reuters.body: Healthsouth Rehabilitation Corp said it has filed for an offering of 2,303,936 common shares, including 303,936 to be sold by shareholdrs, through underwriters led by <Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co Inc> and Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB>. Reuter 
